comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: Opera luminaries Giulio Setti, Giulio Rossi toured extensively in 1912 and 1913. Setti was chorus master of the Metropolitan Opera, Rossi was a basso with the Met. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giulio_Setti Otto Weill was a theater manager, working in various music houses in NY. Based on other images of him, I believe the man standing, looking to the side over his right shoulder, is Weill, not the man crouching in front.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research Cynthia Wenslow. I would agree that Otto Weil is the gentleman standing between Giulio Setti and Giulio Rossi. We'll add a clarification to the record the next time we update.
